interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.TargetHumidity
interface.description: This interface is for setting target humidity of the HAE devices such as humidifier, dehumidifier, etc. This interface also provides capability to get information about the humidity level.

property.name: TargetValue
property.description: Target value for relative humidity / Qualitative level of current humidity

property.name: MinValue
property.description: Minimum value allowed for the TargetValue

property.name: MaxValue
property.description: Maximum value allowed for the TargetValue

property.name: StepValue
property.description: Step value allowed for the TargetValue (relative humidity) setting

property.name: SelectableHumidityLevels
property.description: List of the values of humidity level which can be selected

arg.name: languageTag
arg.description: Language to be used in the output strings
